did.head: Descriptive Summary
did.repository: Special Collections, University of Virginia Library
did.unittitle: Papers of the Dean of Students ca. 1968-1970, 1980-2005
did.physdesc: ca. 12,000 items (40 Hollinger boxes, ca. 17 linear feet)

accessrestrict.head: Access Restrictions
accessrestrict.p: Access restrictions apply to personally identifiable student records under the terms of the Family Educational Rights and Privacy Act (F.E.R.P.A.).

userestrict.head: Use Restrictions
userestrict.p:
See the
University of Virginia Library’s use policy.

prefercite.head: Preferred Citation
prefercite.p: Papers of the Dean of Students, Accession #RG-18/2/1.052, Special Collections, University of Virginia Library, Charlottesville, Va.

acqinfo.head: Acquisition Information
acqinfo.p: This collection was transferred to the Special Collections Archives from the Office of the Dean of Students, Peabody Hall, University of Virginia, through Rhonda F. Saunders on February 3, 2005.

scopecontent.head: Scope and Content
scopecontent.p: This collection consists of the papers from the Office of the Vice President for Student Affairs (formerly Dean of Students), ca. 12,000 items (40 Hollinger boxes, ca. 17 linear feet), ca. 1968-1970 and 1980- 2005, the administrative files of Dean of Students Robert T. Canevari, Associate and Assistant Deans of Students Ronald J. Stump and Michele Samuels, Senior Associate Dean of Students and Director of Student Life Shamim Sisson, Assistant Dean for Latino/Hispanic Students Pablo J. Davis, Assistant Deans for Asian Pacific America Programs Glenna C. Chang, Ajay T. Nair, and Daisy P. Rodriguez.
The papers include reports, correspondence, memoranda, budgets, manuals, surveys, membership lists, events calendars, handouts, sample packets for students, and some printed material.

The collection also contains eight computer diskettes (Disks 0322--0322-g) labeled with catch words such as "Family weekend," "Peer Advising and Family Network," "T-shirt," "APA," "PAFN Brochure" and "Hispanic Student Survey 1994."

arrangement.head: Arrangement
arrangement.p: These papers came from the Dean of Students Office grouped into eight series and these series were maintained:

list.item: Series I: Files of Robert T. Canevari, Dean of Students (Boxes 1-10)
Series II: Files of Ronald J. Stump and Michele Samuels, Associate and Assistant Dean of Students (Boxes 10-14)
Series III: Files of Shamim Sisson, Senior Associate Dean of Students and Director of Student Life (Boxes 14-20)
Series IV: Files of Pablo J. Davis, Assistant Dean for Latino/Hispanic Students (Boxes 20-22)
Series V: Files of Glenna C. Chang, Assistant Dean for Asian Pacific American Programs (Boxes 22-29)
Series VI: Files of Ajay T. Nair, Assistant Dean of Students for Asian Pacific American Students (Boxes 29-32)
Series VII: Files of Ajay T. Nair and Daisy P. Rodriguez, Assistant Dean for Asian Pacific American Students (Boxes 32-35)
